branchCategory.name: R(D)Q, Compact Cylinder, Air Cushion
branchCategory.description: <p>The RQ series air cushion construction allows this series to retain the merits of a compact cylinder. The unique air cushion construction eliminates the cushion ring used in conventional type air cushions, which reduces the overall length of the cylinder. The RQ series meets the demands for reduced shock, noise reduction and improved repeatability at the stroke end. </p>
